resolutions.issue: Google OAuth redirect_uri_mismatch after moving BETTER_AUTH_URL to https://api.kriptik.app
resolutions.resolution: Add https://api.kriptik.app/api/auth/callback/google to the Google OAuth Client's Authorized redirect URIs (and update other providers similarly).

patterns: When changing the Better Auth base URL (BETTER_AUTH_URL), update OAuth provider redirect URIs before deploying.
lessons_learned: Same-site backend subdomain improves session reliability in embedded/mobile browsers, but OAuth redirect allowlists must be updated.
